title: TSP-30-RankTravelOptionsResponse Response Schema
description: Schema for ranked travel options response sent by RMP

requestId.description: Unique Id for this booking - take from the original booking request sent from RMP to TSP.

requester.description: Details of the person who is requesting the options ranking.

dateTime.description: Local time is assumed. Do not include timezone information in the value. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

rankedTravelOptions.description: A list of travel options ranked in order of preference from most preferred to leaast preferred.

providerFeedback.description: If fewer than 9 travel options are provided the reason must be specified.

limitedOptionsReason.description: The reason why fewer than 9 travel options have been provided

limitedOptionsDescription.description: A detailed description of why there are fewer than 9 travel options

groupName.description: Group name to contact if named contact not available.

groupEmail.description: Email address of the contact group.

groupTelephone.description: Phone number of the contact group.

oneOf.description: Constraints requiring either telephone or group telephone to be provided.
Constraints requiring either telephone or group telephone to be provided.

travelOption.description: A travel option that meets the requirements of the return case.

totalTicketPricePence.description: Total price for all tickets for all travellers including any escorts and their return flights.

departureDateTime.description: The date time when the flight departs. Local time is assumed. Do not include timezone information in the value. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss. Must be included for the first flight. Optional for subsequent flights.
